outline:
1. to move to and fro, wave, besprinkle
    1. (Qal) to besprinkle, sprinkle
    2. (Polel) to wave, brandish (in threat)
    3. (Hiphil) to swing, wield, wave
      1. to wield
      2. to wave or shake (the hand)
        1. to wave (hand)
        2. to shake or brandish against
        3. to swing to and fro
      3. to wave (an offering), offer
      4. to shed abroad
    4. (Hophal) to be waved
kjv_def: lift up, move, offer, perfume, send, shake, sift, strike, wave.
strongs_def: to quiver (i.e. vibrate up and down, or rock to and fro); used in a great variety of applications (including sprinkling, beckoning, rubbing, bastinadoing, sawing, waving, etc.)
